LN is a market for UTXOs. UTXOs identity you on the chain, a history that’s hard to shake. When a node opens a channel to you they give you an option to buy a UTXO connected to them. As UTXOs get shuffled and traded, obscuring their history, it improves fungibility across Bitcoin
